scripts.deploy:goerli: export $(xargs <.env) && cd contracts && DEPLOY_CHAIN=GOERLI forge script script/FourbyNFT.s.sol:FourbyScript --rpc-url $GOERLI_RPC_URL --private-key $GOERLI_PRIVATE_KEY --broadcast -vvvv --etherscan-api-key $ETHERSCAN_API_KEY --verify && cd .. && npm run wagmi
scripts.deploy:sepolia: export $(xargs <.env) && cd contracts && DEPLOY_CHAIN=SEPOLIA forge script script/FourbyNFT.s.sol:FourbyScript --rpc-url $SEPOLIA_RPC_URL --private-key $SEPOLIA_PRIVATE_KEY --broadcast -vvvv --etherscan-api-key $ETHERSCAN_API_KEY --verify && cd .. && npm run wagmi
scripts.deploy:anvil: export $(xargs <.env) && cd contracts && DEPLOY_CHAIN=FORGE forge script script/FourbyNFT.s.sol:FourbyScript --rpc-url=$FORGE_RPC_URL --private-key $FORGE_PRIVATE_KEY --broadcast -vvvv && cd .. && npm run wagmi
scripts.dev:foundry: npm run dev & wagmi generate --watch & npm run anvil
